proposal1.heroHeadline: Tennis is losing 200 hours a year on proposal creation. This is where it bleeds.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Your team spends hours crafting proposals for website and product design. Now, do it in 47 seconds with automation.
proposal1.problemsIntro: The following are ongoing losses that Tennis faces due to manual proposal processes.

problems.title: Time-Consuming Process
problems.description: Every hour spent writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. With 200 hours annually, that's potential revenue slipping away.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Manual proposals mean inconsistent branding, risking client confusion. This inconsistency could cost you key design projects.

problems.title: High Labor Costs
problems.description: Paying skilled designers for admin tasks is inefficient. Over $15,000 a year lost on tasks that automation can handle.

problems.title: Delayed Responses
problems.description: Clients waiting for proposals might find alternatives. Delays risk losing up to 10% of potential new business.

problems.title: Human Error Risks
problems.description: Manual work is prone to errors, causing reworks and lost trust. Each mistake can cost you a client and future referrals.

problems.title: Stress on Team
problems.description: Your small team is stretched thin, leading to burnout. This stress reduces creativity and efficiency in website and product design.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Introducing the AI automation system, replacing inefficiencies with streamlined proposal generation.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, crafting proposals eats up hours. With our system, generate them in under 60 seconds, freeing up valuable time.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manually created proposals often differ in style. Our system ensures every proposal aligns perfectly with your brand.

solutions.title: Cost Reduction
solutions.description: Manually drafting proposals costs you in labor. Our system cuts these costs, increasing profitability.

solutions.title: Rapid Client Response
solutions.description: Clients currently wait for proposals, risking loss. Now, respond instantly, capturing their interest immediately.

solutions.title: Error-Free Output
solutions.description: Manual errors can damage client trust. Automated proposals are precise, protecting your reputation and client relationships.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Tennis's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Tennis around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Tennis.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Elevate Acme Corp with Unified Web Design.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Let's create a seamless digital experience that reflects your brand and boosts engagement. Our plan involves a comprehensive website overhaul.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Every missed opportunity online is revenue slipping away.

problems.title: High Bounce Rate
problems.description: Visitors are leaving your site almost immediately. This results in a 20% loss of potential customers daily.

problems.title: Slow Load Times
problems.description: A slow website frustrates users. Each second delay costs you 5% in conversion rates.

problems.title: Outdated Design
problems.description: An outdated design makes your brand look less credible. This perception is costing you 15% in potential sales.

problems.title: Complex Navigation
problems.description: A complicated site navigation confuses users. This leads to a 25% drop in user engagement.

problems.title: Mobile Incompatibility
problems.description: Your site isn't optimized for mobile. This oversight results in a 30% decrease in mobile traffic retention.

problems.title: Weak Integration
problems.description: Disconnected tools are slowing down operations. This inefficiency leads to a 10% loss in productivity.

proposal2.solutionIntro: We address these problems through strategic web design and optimization.

solutions.title: Website Design and Development
solutions.description: We create brand-aligned websites that are easy to update and maintain. This enhances user experience and retention.

solutions.title: Optimization and Support
solutions.description: Improving performance and automation. This ensures your site runs smoothly and efficiently.

solutions.title: Product Design and Development
solutions.description: Designing intuitive digital products that scale. This helps streamline operations and drive impact.

solutions.title: Tool Integration
solutions.description: Connecting your tools to unify operations. This boosts productivity and simplifies workflows.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Tennis is your partner for impactful digital transformation.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: We've helped brands like yours enhance their digital presence.

whyUsCards.title: Collaborative Approach
whyUsCards.description: We work closely with your team to ensure our solutions fit your needs.

whyUsCards.title: Detail Oriented
whyUsCards.description: Every detail matters. We ensure nothing is overlooked in your project.

whyUsCards.title: Results Driven
whyUsCards.description: Our focus is on delivering tangible results that boost your business.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the team dedicated to your project's success.

team.name: Marcello Gortana
team.bio: Marcello leads strategy and client relationships at Tennis. His focus is on ensuring each project aligns with client goals.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like
proposal2.pricingIntro: Choose an investment option that suits your growth plan.

pricing.name: Basic Package
pricing.description: Essential services to get you started.

pricing.name: Growth Package
pricing.description: Our recommended package for most businesses.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's chat about how we can help. No pressure, just a conversation.
proposal2.footerSub: Designing for impact, building for success.

lead.company_description: Founded in 2017, Tennis is a digital agency that drives impact through digital transformation and our process-driven approach. We work with medium and enterprise businesses, venture firms, product companies, startups, associations and nonprofits. Our services include UX/UI, web design, branding, development, technology consulting, and experiential. We emphasize delivering measurable impact through structured processes to deliver solutions that help organizations achieve significant growth, optimization, or position for acquisition.
